item.title: Beads Actually is introducing a special merlion bead in celebration of SG50, available for a limited time only
item.description:
The Singaporean store Beads Actually is offering pre-orders for a merlion bead from OHM Beads. The merlion, a creature with a lion’s head and a fish’s body and tail, is a well-known symbol of Singapore. Only two hundred of these beads are available, exclusively through Beads Actually from July 2nd to July 31st. Following this period, it will be available for individual purchase globally. The bead, priced at S$110, is included in a starter kit featuring either a plain bangle or a snap-clasp bracelet...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beads-actually-is-introducing-a-special-merlion-bead-in-celebration-of-sg50-available-for-a-limited-time-only/

item.title: Amazing Sonos S5 Wireless Whole House Music System
item.description:
Remember those old record players and stereos? They were once staples in our homes, but now there’s a new way to enjoy high-quality music. Introducing the Sonos S5 wireless music system! Sure, stereos are fine if you’re content with limited options like FM radio or your old record collection. But technology has evolved, and the Sonos S5 is leading the way. Don’t let the bookshelf speaker design fool you, these units are packed with five individual speakers and amplifiers for impressive audio performance...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/amazing-sonos-s5-wireless-whole-house-music-system/
